SELECT * FROM MethRfc2544B2B_LoopVariables

Properties.value: FIXME: I am ignoring the Dropped, Late, and OOS frame counts.

Children.Name: Results: Create MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts by joining the RxEotStreamResults and TxEotStreamResults tables

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: Results: Create MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts by joining the RxEotStreamResults and TxEotStreamResults tables

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts AS SELECT RxPort AS RxPort, tx.FrameCount AS TxFrames, rx.FrameCount AS RxFrames, DroppedFrameCount, LateFrameCount, OutSeqFrameCount FROM TxEotStreamResults AS tx INNER JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS rx ON tx.StreamId=rx.Comp32
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts (RxPort, TxFrames, RxFrames, DroppedFrameCount, LateFrameCount, OutSeqFrameCount)
DELETE FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts
SELECT * FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts

Properties.name: Text
Properties.value: This is a hack - if ARP fails, the RxEotStreamResults and/or RxEotStreamResults table will be empty.  If either table is empty, the join will fail and MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts will also be empty.

sql_for_command_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

sql_statement.static: INSERT INTO MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts (RxPort, TxFrames, RxFrames, DroppedFrameCount, LateFrameCount, OutSeqFrameCount) VALUES (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

sql_for_command_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TxEotStreamResults) != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Children.Name: TxEotStreamResults table is not empty, copy its contents

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: TxEotStreamResults table is not empty, copy its contents

sql_statement.static: DELETE FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts
INSERT INTO MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts (RxPort, TxFrames) SELECT RxPort, FrameCount FROM TxEotStreamResults

sql_for_command_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RxEotStreamResults) != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Children.Name: RxEotStreamResults table is not empty, copy its contents

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: RxEotStreamResults table is not empty, copy its contents

sql_statement.static: UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts SET RxFrames = (SELECT FrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts SET DroppedFrameCount = (SELECT DroppedFrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts SET LateFrameCount = (SELECT LateFrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts SET OutSeqFrameCount = (SELECT OutSeqFrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET FramesSent = (SELECT SUM(TxFrames) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET BurstsSent = ROUND(((SELECT FramesSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) / (1.0 * (SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial))), 2)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET FramesReceived = (SELECT SUM(RxFrames) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameCounts)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET FramesLost = FramesSent - FramesReceived

Children.Name: Results: Calculate and add Loss into MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: Results: Calculate and add Loss into MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

sql_statement.static: UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET Loss=(ROUND((SELECT FramesLost FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) * 100.0 / (SELECT FramesSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial), 2))
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET Loss=0.0 WHERE Loss IS NULL

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial SET Verdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN ((SELECT FramesSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) > 0 AND (SELECT FramesReceived FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) > 0 AND (SELECT Loss FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) = 0) THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END)

Children.Name: Results: Push iteration's MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial into summary and append into MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: Results: Push iteration's MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial into summary and append into MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial

sql_statement.static: DELETE FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial
SELECT * FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial
INSERT INTO MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial SELECT FrameSize, BurstSize, Trial, FramesSent, FramesReceived, BurstsSent, FramesLost, Loss, Load, Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

Properties.name: Text
Properties.value: Reviews Frame Loss to determine if this trial passed

report.explanation: This trial can only pass if are no lost frames

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: PASS:  No frame loss was detected by the Analyzer

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial WHERE Verdict != 'PASS') > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: FAIL:  At least one frame was lost

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', BurstSize AS 'Burst Size (frames)', Trial AS 'Trial #', FramesSent AS 'Tx Frame Count', BurstsSent AS 'Bursts Sent (frames)', FramesReceived AS 'Rx Frame Count', FramesLost AS 'Frames Lost', Loss AS 'Frame Loss %', Load AS 'Load %', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial WHERE Verdict != 'PASS'

Properties.name: Text
Properties.value: Reviews Total Frame Loss to determine if this Burst Size is acceptable.

sql_statement.static: INSERT INTO MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst (FrameSize, BurstSize, Load) SELECT FrameSize, BurstSize, Load FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET TotalFramesSent=(SELECT SUM(FramesSent) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET AvgBurstsSent=ROUND((SELECT TotalFramesSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) / (1.0 * (SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) / (SELECT Trial FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial), 2) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET TotalFramesReceived=(SELECT SUM(FramesReceived) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET TotalFramesLost=(SELECT SUM(FramesLost) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET AvgFramesLost=(ROUND((SELECT TotalFramesLost FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) * 100.0 / (SELECT TotalFramesSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)), 2)) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET AvgFramesLost=0.0 WHERE AvgFramesLost IS NULL AND FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET Verdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT TotalFramesLost FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) > 0 THEN "FAIL" ELSE "PASS" END) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst SET Verdict='FAIL' WHERE (TotalFramesSent = 0) OR (TotalFramesReceived = 0)

report.explanation: Reviews total frame loss to determine if this Burst Size is acceptable

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: PASS:  No frame loss was detected by the Analyzer.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT Verdict != 'PASS' FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: FAIL:  The table shows the total number of frames lost for all trials of this burst size.

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', BurstSize AS 'Burst Size (frames)', TotalFramesSent AS 'Tx Frame Count', AvgBurstsSent AS 'Avg Bursts Sent', TotalFramesReceived AS 'Rx Frame Count', TotalFramesLost AS 'Tx Frames Lost', AvgFramesLost AS 'Average Frames Lost', Load AS 'Load %', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE TotalFramesLost > 0 AND FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', BurstSize AS 'Burst Size (frames)', Trial AS 'Trial #', FramesSent AS 'Tx Frame Count', BurstsSent AS 'Bursts Sent (frames)', FramesReceived AS 'Rx Frame Count', FramesLost AS 'Frames Lost', Loss AS 'Loss %', Load AS 'Load %', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurstTrial WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT BurstSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

Properties.name: Text
Properties.value: Reviews list of Burst Sizes to determine if this Frame Size is acceptable

sql_statement.static: INSERT INTO MethRfc2544B2B_Frame (FrameSize, Load, Threshold) SELECT FrameSize, Load, Threshold FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_Frame SET MaxBurst=(SELECT MAX(BurstSize) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE Verdict='PASS' AND FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_Frame SET AvgBursts=(SELECT AvgBurstsSent FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE Verdict='PASS' AND FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) AND BurstSize=(SELECT MaxBurst FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial))) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_Frame SET MaxBurst=0 WHERE MaxBurst IS NULL
UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_Frame SET AvgBursts=0 WHERE AvgBursts IS NULL

UPDATE MethRfc2544B2B_Frame SET Verdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MaxBurst FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) >= (SELECT Threshold FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial) THEN "PASS" ELSE "FAIL" END) WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

report.explanation: Reviews list of burst sizes to determine if this Frame Size is acceptable

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: PASS:  This Frame Size has at least one acceptable Burst Size

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT Verdict = 'PASS' FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: FAIL:  The table shows the burst size(s) that did not meet the threshold

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxBurst AS 'Max Burst Size (frames)', AvgBursts AS 'Avg Bursts Sent', Threshold AS 'Min Acceptable Burst Size (frames)', Load AS 'Load %', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE MaxBurst < (SELECT Threshold FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame) AND FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', BurstSize AS 'Burst Size (frames)', TotalFramesSent AS 'Tx Frame Count', AvgBurstsSent AS 'Avg Bursts Sent', TotalFramesReceived AS 'Rx Frame Count', TotalFramesLost AS 'Tx Frames Lost', AvgFramesLost AS 'Average Frames Lost', Load AS 'Load %', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_FrameBurst WHERE FrameSize=(SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial)

Children.Name: Split the queries into separate lists for the chart

Properties.name: Name
Properties.value: Split the queries into separate lists for the chart

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame

set_property.replace: SELECT MaxBurst From MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize={}

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize || ' bytes' AS name FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame
SELECT Threshold FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial
SELECT Threshold FROM MethRfc2544B2B_CurrentTrial

Properties.name: Series
value: SELECT MaxBurst From MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=128
SELECT MaxBurst From MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=256
SELECT MaxBurst From MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE FrameSize=512

report.explanation: Summary of maximum burst sizes for each frame size

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: PASS:  All frame sizes were able to send bursts > threshold without any frame loss.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE Verdict!="PASS") > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: FAIL:  At least one frame size did not have a lossless burst size > threshold.

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxBurst AS 'Maximum burst size (frames)', AvgBursts AS 'Avg Bursts Sent', Threshold AS 'Min Acceptable Burst Size (frames)', Load AS 'Load (%)', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame WHERE Verdict!="PASS"

report.explanation: Table of Maximum Burst Sizes per Frame Size

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxBurst AS 'Maximum burst size (frames)', AvgBursts AS 'Avg Bursts Sent', Threshold AS 'Min Acceptable Burst Size (frames)', Load AS 'Load (%)', Verdict FROM MethRfc2544B2B_Frame
